level.heading: Registration of a tenant organization.
level.text: In a housing accommodation of 5 or more units, the tenants may form and register the tenant organization with the Mayor, pursuant to § 42-3404.11, at any time; provided, that this section shall not be construed to alter the time periods within which a tenant organization may exercise the rights afforded by this chapter. A tenant organization may file a petition for relief pursuant to § 42-3405.03 or § 42-3405.03a.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Sept. 10, 1980, D.C. Law 3-86, § 402a, formerly § 402b, as added July 22, 2005, D.C. Law 16-15, § 2(c), 52 DCR 6885; renumbered Mar. 2, 2007, D.C. Law 16-191, § 101(b), 53 DCR 6794.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-15
level.text: For Law 16-15, see notes following § s 42-3401.03.
